verbs.description: President Trump ’s [ARGM-ADV: hand] - [V: picked] ambassador to Israel is in hot water for what congressional Democrats say is an effort to “ politicize ” the vaunted U.S .- Israeli relationship . David Friedman was quoted in an Israeli newspaper as saying Republicans are a better friend to Israel than Democrats .
